item.description:
Hi everyone! It is amazing to me that 2012 is almost gone! The time of fun and stress are upon us. Remember....some nice slow deap breathing works wonders for stress.
Holiday extravaganza potluck!! Wear your best or worst holiday sweater :). We will be having a yankee swap ($10 max)! participation totally not mandatory! If you have party plans stop by to have a good dinner before heading out. Please bring a raw organic dish enough for 6-8 people. If you are new and not sure what to bring a salad (fruit or veggie) is always good. If I don't get to see you I would like to wish you very Fun Holidays and a Happy New Year!

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: Dec 7 Holiday Extravaganza!!
